extDescription.message: Yana ƙara asalin haɗe‑haɗe ta atomatik a amsoshin imel.

uiNoOptions.message: A halin yanzu babu abin da za a daidaita.

uiSupport.message: Kana son wannan ƙarin? Taimake ni da ƙaramar gudummawa:

uiGithubText.message: Don bayar da rahoton kuskure ko wasu tambayoyi, duba

uiBlacklistHeader.message: Jerin baƙi na sunayen fayil (tsarin glob)

uiBlacklistHelp.message: Fayilolin da sunayensu suka dace da ɗaya daga cikin waɗannan tsarin ba za a taɓa haɗa su ta atomatik ba. Tsari ɗaya a kowane layi. Misalai: *.png, smime.*, *.p7s

uiWarnBlacklistLabel.message: Gargaɗi idan an cire haɗe‑haɗe saboda jerin baƙi

uiConfirmHelp.message: Ƙaramin taga na tabbatarwa yana bayyana ne kawai idan za a ƙara haɗe‑haɗe a zahiri. Maballin kwamfuta: Y ko J = Eh; N ko Esc = A'a.

warnBlacklistIntro.message: Ba za a haɗa fayilolin da ke ƙasa ta atomatik ba:
